trans-unit.source: This app presents the best movies ever made in the world in a visual format. Browse through the top movies made in Hollywood or internationally. Movies are categorized by Hollywood, Bollywood or International. Bollywood is the term used for the Hindi-language film industry based in Mumbai, India. The 'International' films category includes movies made all over the world except Hollywood and Bollywood.
trans-unit.target: This app presents the best movies ever made in the world in a visual format. Browse through the top movies made in Hollywood or internationally. Movies are categorized by Hollywood, Bollywood or International. Bollywood is the term used for the Hindi-language film industry based in Mumbai, India. The 'International' films category includes movies made all over the world except Hollywood and Bollywood.

trans-unit.source: The movie posters are copyright of Amazon.com or its content suppliers. We make no copyright claim to the movie poster images.
trans-unit.target: The movie posters are copyright of Amazon.com or its content suppliers. We make no copyright claim to the movie poster images.

trans-unit.source: If you have a support issue or would like to suggest a feature, please email us at support@daksatech.com
trans-unit.target: If you have a support issue or would like to suggest a feature, please email us at support@daksatech.com

trans-unit.source: Share a movie: From the movies page, bring up the 'Share' charm. Select the application to use for sharing.
trans-unit.target: Share a movie: From the movies page, bring up the 'Share' charm. Select the application to use for sharing.

trans-unit.source: See details of movie: Click on the 'Movie Details' button in app bar OR double tap/click on the movie poster.
trans-unit.target: See details of movie: Click on the 'Movie Details' button in app bar OR double tap/click on the movie poster.

trans-unit.source: Buy movie: Click on the 'Buy Movie' button in app bar.
trans-unit.target: Buy movie: Click on the 'Buy Movie' button in app bar.

trans-unit.source: This Privacy Policy covers your use of this application. The app does not collect, store, or share any personal information, or anything related to your device. We do not collect any statistics, trends, neither do we track user movements. The site does allow you to visit external websites - specifically Amazon.com and Wikipedia.com and their affiliated sites. These websites may collect information related to your IP address, device, etc. Please check the privacy policy of these websites for details on information collected by them.
trans-unit.target: This Privacy Policy covers your use of this application. The app does not collect, store, or share any personal information, or anything related to your device. We do not collect any statistics, trends, neither do we track user movements. The site does allow you to visit external websites - specifically Amazon.com and Wikipedia.com and their affiliated sites. These websites may collect information related to your IP address, device, etc. Please check the privacy policy of these websites for details on information collected by them.

trans-unit.source: The app allows you to share the articles using the Share charm. The application you use to share the articles are not related to this app. Please check the privacy policy of those apps for how they use your data. The app also collects usage data. This information is stored on Google Analytics servers. No personally identifiable information is sent or stored.
trans-unit.target: The app allows you to share the articles using the Share charm. The application you use to share the articles are not related to this app. Please check the privacy policy of those apps for how they use your data. The app also collects usage data. This information is stored on Google Analytics servers. No personally identifiable information is sent or stored.

trans-unit.source: The country setting is only used to direct you to a site in your country when you click the 'Buy Movie' button.
trans-unit.target: The country setting is only used to direct you to a site in your country when you click the 'Buy Movie' button.

trans-unit.source: Your country information is only used to direct you to the appropriate site when you click the "Buy Movie" button.
trans-unit.target: Your country information is only used to direct you to the appropriate site when you click the "Buy Movie" button.
